mapper.select: select * from reservation_tb resv join team_tb t on resv.user_id = t.id join space_tb s on resv.space_id = s.id join space_pic_tb sp on s.id = sp.space_id where resv.matching = true
select * from reservation_tb r join user_tb u on r.user_id = u.id join space_tb s on r.space_id = s.id join space_pic_tb sp on sp.space_id = s.id where u.id = #{id}
select space_id, space_name, space_location, space_pic, price_per_hour from space_tb as space join space_pic_tb as pic on space.id= pic.space_id where space.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation_tb(personnel, to_host, matching,user_id,space_id, created_at) values (#{personnel}, #{toHost}, #{matching}, #{userId}, #{spaceId}, now());
